## Return Value

A [doc://com.apple.coreimage/documentation/CoreImage/CIFilter-swift.class] object implementing the custom filter.

## Discussion

Core Image calls this method when a filter is requested by name using the [doc://com.apple.coreimage/documentation/CoreImage/CIFilter-swift.class] class method [doc://com.apple.coreimage/documentation/CoreImage/CIFilter-swift.class/init(name:)] method (or related methods). # filter(withName:)

**Instance Method**

Returns a filter object specified by name.

## Declaration

```swift
func filter(withName name: String) -> CIFilter?
```

## Parameters

- **name**: The name of the requested custom filter.

## Return Value

A [doc://com.apple.coreimage/documentation/CoreImage/CIFilter-swift.class] object implementing the custom filter.

## Discussion

Core Image calls this method when a filter is requested by name using the [doc://com.apple.coreimage/documentation/CoreImage/CIFilter-swift.class] class method [doc://com.apple.coreimage/documentation/CoreImage/CIFilter-swift.class/init(name:)] method (or related methods). Your implementation of this method should provide a new instance of the [doc://com.apple.coreimage/documentation/CoreImage/CIFilter-swift.class] subclass for your custom filter.

## Related Documentation

- **Core Image Programming Guide**
